title: Virtual Learning Environment Evaluation and Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Utilization Skills and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Project-based course evaluating the effectiveness of virtual learning environments (VLE) for language acquisition in smartphone-centric constrained technological settings and deriving improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the four domains of a virtual learning environment (VLE)—information space, interaction space, instructional design space, and exhibition space—using a checklist.
Learners can propose at least three actionable strategies for improving virtual learning environments based on assessment results.
Learners can design specific measures (e.g., message templates, feedback cycles) to enhance learner-advisor interactions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
